-1.title: FBI Changed the Definition of Rape But Some States Still Don't Recognize Male Rape

imdb.plot outline: Circa is a new mobile-friendly, video-driven news and entertainment portal designed for the next-generation consumer who wants to do more than just read or watch content. It's a place where you can experience the news, drill down to learn more and talk about things that matter. The Circa experience doesn't end with the story or video; it continues with plenty of places to engage others, take action or do more of your own exploration and reporting.
imdb.title: Circa News
plot: Circa is a new mobile-friendly, video-driven news and entertainment portal designed for the next-generation consumer who wants to do more than just read or watch content.::Circa
